title: The March of Technology
author: VD
content_html:
It goes ever on, as the brand names of the past fall by the wayside. Internet Explorer, which I assiduously avoided using even back in the days of the Netscape Wars, has been retired. I always liked its logo, though.

DISCUSS ON SG
